__TOC__

This page keeps track of the current release status of the Mobile Team.

=== Weekly summary ===

* uboot: unblocked by using old uboot (2009.01); progress with freescale upstream on current blockers for 2009.08
* investigating marvel dove (thumb2) hangs: managed to workaround this by not using python!
* ongoing progress on thumb2 package review and ftbfs - <nowiki>[[ARM-Thumb2PackageReviewList]]</nowiki>
* review blueprints and WI for alpha-3

=== RC Bugs ===

Fixed this week:
* Bug:488267: ffmpeg: "should be built with -marm for lucid on armel"
* Bug:462798: ubiquity: "selecting 'new partition table' confuses the partitioning"

Fix available:
* Bug:490792: xulrunner-1.9.1: ARM/Thumb interworking support missing from nanojit
* Bug:511197: busybox: "must be built with -marm for lucid on armel"

Bugs which need better understanding/debugging:
* Bug:456659: linux-fsl-imx51: suspend/resume failure on imx51
* Bug:499881: linux-fsl-imx51 "usb storage with ext4 does not work in lucid" 
* Bug:504880: linux-mvl-dove "[dove] possibility of thumb2 instructions invalidly being handled"
* Bug:505772: linux-mvl-dove "system freezes sometimes after X is up for a while" 
* Bug:506761: uboot-imx "lucid uboot hangs on fatload uImage on fsl TO2 TO2.5 and TO3"
* Bug:507887: uboot-imx "NIC not properly initialized in uboot code" 

=== Blueprint/Activity alpha-3 ===

==== Essential ====
* mobile-lucid-arm-gcc-v7-thumb2: some work items left for debian import freeze time
* mobile-lucid-une-2d-launcher: requires seed change
* mobile-lucid-imx51-debian-cd-to-uboot: issues with partitioning resolved; some minor issues left; moving images to uboot now.

==== High ====
* mobile-lucid-arm-alternate-images: implemented
* mobile-lucid-arm-lightweightbrowser: benchmark/review/archive upload pending (today)
* mobile-lucid-arm-lib-tests: porting, packaging done. dropped the datacenter deployment part, but work on making test results locally reproducible
* mobile-lucid-bringup-testing: implemented
* mobile-lucid-arm-suspend-resume-testplan: progress; dropped corner case testcases from lucid to remove more roadblocks
* mobile-lucid-arm-device-tree-support: postponed - blocked on upstream
* mobile-lucid-arm-une: just started, still semi blocked on 2d launcher
* mobile-lucid-arm-per-soc-powermanagement: slow progress - deferred by ogra being blocked on uboot

=== Planned intrusive changes for Alpha-3 ===

* move to uboot for imx51
* switch armel images from desktop to UNE seeds
* rebuild not yet build main packages at DIF time
